name: Last Land Heroes
description:
Last Land Heroes is a survival game, You have to claim the land to keep it from falling into darkness. However Many foes (Slimes) take away the claim causing loss of land.

How To Play:

Arrows to move and jump (Triple jumps!)
X to use your attack, Hold it to use your Special attack! M to mute.

Entry of Ludum Dare 42 [Running out of Space]

Do Vote, Share & Comment, Thank you.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/last-land-heroes
